title: NVIDIA Isaac-GR00T secure_server Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of NVIDIA Isaac-GR00T. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the secure_server method. The issue results from the lack of authentication prior to allowing access to functionality. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to bypass authentication on the system.
addtionnal_details: NVIDIA has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/5681
timeline:
2025-05-22 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-08-20 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-08-20 - Advisory Updated
credit: Peter Girnus (@gothburz) of Trend Zero Day Initiative
